summary:
It is a re-texture of the dwarven armour.

It is coloured like the Blood Ravens, a Chapter of the Space Marines from the game Series Dawn of War.
descriptionHtml:
It is a re-textured version of the dwarven armour, so it will replace the vanilla dwarven amour set.
It is coloured like the Blood Ravens, a Chapter of the Space Marines from the game Series Dawn of War. I know that the game Warhammer is around since the 80 but the Blood Ravens Chapter got big with the PC-Game Series.

re-textured for male and female

Gauntlets, Amour and Boots
author: MichaelNight
